EmailTemplate.subject: Your Lighthouse Account - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Yodle_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
We are reaching out regarding your Lighthouse account. We are no longer receiving communication from your server and as a result are not seeing changes to appointments in your SMS.
If your server has been turned off because the shop is closed, you can disregard this message. Communication should begin normally when you turn your server back on.
If your server is on and you received this message, please do the following:
-Log on to your server computer and click the link below to start a remote session for our support team to investigate. -This should download a file onto your computer. Open that file and click “Run”. If you have trouble locating the file go to the downloads section of your browser. With most browsers, you can find downloads by pressing ctrl+J. -Start your Session by clicking on this link: {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Bomgar_Shortcut__c}
If you have any questions please contact us. Our support teams are here to help!
Lighthouse Support (855) 855-8728
